* Zyber looks around at the interior of Rowdy's den but then her scanners 
suddenly activate, they alert her that there was some sort of bot heading in 
their direction. But then suddenly the signature detected fizzed and was no 
more, could it have been energon interference? She looked out of Rowdy's den 
but then shakes her head, there was no reason to go off chasing sensor 
ghosts when it was so dark out.
Zyber walked into Rowdy Wolf's den a little more and then sat by a small pit 
that almost looked as if it has obtained a fire at one point.
Her fur was ruffled from the wind that had picked up while they had traveled 
and she felt uncomfortable.
Zyber curled her tail around her feet...*

" Pardon me, my fur is in a frightful mess."

* With that said she soon settled and began to lick at her shoulder, 
cleaning and straightening the fur to it's feathery and sleek appearance.*

_____________________________________________________________

* Iron Raptor growled as she sank her teeth into Scavenger's shoulder but 
then roars when both his shot and Zardus's charges hit her both at the same 
time, creating one massive explosion with her in the middle of it!
She staggered back from her target after the giant fire ball disappeared, a 
large gash and hole in her side and neck. Despite her power being over the 
minimal requirements to sustain her Second Beast Mode she just couldn't keep 
it up, with a snarl she transformed into her robot mode and fell to her 
knees.
A puddle of mech-fluid forming on the ground around her, soon she couldn't 
even kneel any longer...with a sigh she collapsed on the ground, her 
shoulder striking first.
Iron Raptor layed on her side, the gash in her neck and the hole on her 
stomach still spilling fluid and her power escaping with it.
She planted her hands firmly on the ground and tried to raise her torso, 
without having mush success she slowly looked up and snarled weakly at 
Scavenger...a deadly but weak look on her face...*

" I am...not...defeated yet!"

* With those last words she reached back and pulled out her splatter gun, 
with not so careful aim she fired at the Predacon in hope that her charges 
would hit home.
With a sigh she then collapsed again to the ground and rested her head on 
the sandy surface, her scanners located Scavenger and she fired again at 
where it was detected. With no Maximals in front of her she didn't have to 
worry about hitting fellow fighters, just either hitting some Predacon or 
missing completely.
Iron Raptor sighed but then snarled as she put on a little more energy and 
slowly came up from her laying spot. She made it all the way to her knees 
but that was as far as she could go without falling to her stomach.
The mech-fluid gushed from her stomach and neck, she was loosing fluid fast 
but she couldn't just give up. She had a base to protect...as well as the 
fabric of time!
She knew that she still had just enough energy to transform into her Second 
Beast Mode one last time but juat as she was thinking about that she felt 
that last chance slip away with even more energy, it was now to late!
Iron Raptor continued to fire upon Scavenger as she kneeled there, she just 
hoped that she wouldn't get hit like she had been before...it just might be 
the end of her! If she didn't bleed to death first!*
